channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- SmartThings
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- SmartThings

item.title: CVE-2024-34596|2024-08-02T02:59:21.931Z -- samsung%20mobile -- smartthings
item.description: Improper authentication in SmartThings prior to version 1.8.17 allows remote attackers to bypass the expiration date for members set by the owner.

item.title: CVE-2024-20852|2024-07-08T13:31:15.663Z -- samsung%20mobile -- smartthings
item.description: Improper verification of intent by broadcast receiver vulnerability in SmartThings prior to version 1.8.13.22 allows local attackers to access testing configuration.
